text:
『Kaho, there's something I need to ask you.
Can you come to the waiting room?』

Something to ask...
I wonder what it could be...?

Thanks for coming, Kaho. ──Straight to the point,
I want to entrust you with an important task.

That's right. There's a camera over there, isn't it?
I want to entrust it to you.

I believe only you can do it.
I want you to take photos during this training camp.

We plan to use the photos for a promotional
article about Houkura. Can I count on you?

I see! ──Then,
I appoint Kaho as the photographer! I'm counting on you.

Got it!
I'll do my best!

Right!
Now, let's talk about the training camp!

Yes!
I'll take lots of photos!

Expecting photos that only a friend can take!
If you have any trouble, come to me anytime.

(............
Yeah, looks like we can expect some great photos!)
